name: Ciphper
description:
Background story: this code was once used on a REAL site to encrypt REAL data. Thankfully, this code is no longer being used and has not for a long time.

A long time ago, one of the sites I was building needed to store some some potentially sensitive data. I did not know how to use any proper encryption techniques, so I wrote my own symmetric {{url_for("crypto.php", display="cipher")}}.

The encrypted content in {{url_for("output.bin")}} is a well-known, olde English quote in lowercase ASCII alphabetic characters. No punctuation; just letters and spaces.

The flag is key to understanding this message.
hints: The first 6 characters of the flag are gigem{.
author: Matthew Barry
